overview: Arun is an ice-cream seller from Haldibari, a border town in West Bengal. He happily travels through the remote areas of rural Bengal for work. When he learns about an upcoming village fair in a nearby area, he plans to visit it. During the travel, he encounters different kinds of people – some try to help him reach his destination while others mislead him. He experiences setbacks and surreal events which teach him the meaning of love and life.
title: Nitantoi Sahaj Saral
